author: Chelsea Gomez,Natalie Kalata,Inayat Singh, Joseph Loiero
title: International students feeling isolated and financially strapped as they wait out pandemic
description: As universities and colleges close their campuses and ask students to leave residences in response to the COVID-19 outbreak, international students in Canada are finding themselves increasingly isolated, lonely and worried about their future.
content:
As universities and colleges close their campuses and ask students to leave residences in response to the COVID-19 outbreak, international students in Canada are finding themselves increasingly isolated, lonely and worried about their future.
